alert.note: Alert for Kennebec; Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 6:30AM EDT until May 05 at 1:38PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Kennebec and Somerset Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Kennebec River at Skowhegan. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 35,000.0 cfs, Flooding begins at campgrounds in Skowhegan. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM EDT Friday the flow was 38,000.0 cfs. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this morning and continue falling to 28,170.0 cfs Sunday morning. - Flood flow is 35,000.0 cfs. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
